response.overview: The history of the last 3 years of Cheran's struggle is already known. This community of Michoacán, in defense of its forests. found political self-determination and citizen self-defense.  Through art and culture, the boys, girls and young people of the community express their ideas and emotions about the conflict and the current situation of a Cheran that is reinforced by reforesting and enjoying peace in its streets. The voice of women - pioneers in the uprising -, community radio stations and members of the symbolic bonfires complement this story that mixes a portrait of the community and its struggle with the representation that children make of it.
response.title: Cheran - Land to dream
